task.title: Translating repetitions
task.shortdesc: Learn how to simplify your translation process in memoQ by creating a view containing only repetitions.

taskbody.context: If your DITA project contains a lot of repeated content, it may be useful to include all repetitions in one view. In order to create a view containing all repetitions, follow these steps:

step.cmd: Go to Project home Translations and select all files.
Right-click the files and select Create View.
In the Create view dialog, enter the Name of the view, select Extract repetitions, and click OK.

taskbody.result: You can work on a view containing all repeated segments in your project.
